name: The Apple's Potions
description:
Currently in development. The game is continuous and does not have an ending.

Summary:

 Help Senore Mela create potions for each customer. 

Instructions: 

Use "potion" board to see the recipes for each potion. There is a restock list where you can buy ingredients in case you run out. Drag and drop relevant ingredients to it's designated cooking station. The cauldron is the main cookware so anything prepped on the cutting board and oven goes straight into the cauldron which will finalise the potion. Note that the ingredients can get overcooked/overdone so drag and drop the burnt ingredient to the bin. Serve customer potion. 

GGJ23 ROOTS: How does the game fit the theme? 

  • The environment is based on a tree 
  • One of the ingredients is a root
  • Customer's needs are related to family/loved ones
  • If we had more time, we would make a delivery service which shows a map connected to where each customer is
